thread.title: EPA moves to restrict ozone emissions | Libertarian
thread.title_full: EPA moves to restrict ozone emissions | Libertarian

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: EPA moves to restrict ozone emissions | Libertarian
text:
(Before It's News)
USA Today Quote: s CEI expert Myron Ebell on EPA's new restrictions on ozone pollutants.
The pro-business Competitive Enterprise Institute said compliance costs of the new ozone regulations will lead to a loss of jobs, particularly in the manufacturing and mining industries.
“The ozone rule on top of the greenhouse gas rules make President Obama's Environmental Protection Agency the No. 1 job killer in America,” said Myron Ebell, director of CEI's Center for Energy and Environment.
Date: Thursday, October 1, 2015 Citation: USA Today Experts: Myron Ebell Publication Type: Citations Issues: Energy and Environment
